title: Cape Forchu
description: A dramatic coastal lighthouse with rugged cliffs, ocean views, and unforgettable sunsets.

title: Port Maitland Beach
description: A peaceful sandy beach perfect for long walks, fresh sea air, and quiet relaxation.

title: Smuggler Cove
description: A hidden coastal gem with rocky shores, calm waters, and a sense of untouched beauty.

title: Lake Adventures
description: Enjoy outdoor thrills including mountain biking, kayaking, and paddle boarding in scenic surroundings.

title: Beach Glass Collecting & Craft
description: Search the shoreline for colorful sea glass and turn your finds into handcrafted souvenirs.

title: Beau Vendredi
description: A local favorite featuring fresh crab legs and relaxed Friday sunset dining experiences.

title: Brier Island Whale Tours
description: Experience guided whale tours and the iconic Balancing Rock hike along dramatic coastal landscapes.
